title: Vu Le Tran, PhD
text:
Welcome to my website. I am Vu Le Tran, an experienced Quantitative Investment researcher specializing in empirical asset pricing, ESG, sustainable investment, and machine learning.
I am also an experienced practitioner in the investment industry with a solid foundation in risk management, fund management, investment management, portfolio management, and Python/R programming. I was the key contributor to the fund management and operation of NorQuant Multi-Asset and NorQuant ESG mutual funds.
Additionally, I am honored to serve as a board member for the Norwegian Association for Quantitative Finance. I am always seeking new opportunities to apply my expertise in a dynamic and innovative environment. Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to exploring the possibilities together.
